step.datasource:
INSERT INTO dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate ([db] ,[ord_soort],[ordernr],[ID],[regel],[artcode],[oms45],[esr_aantal] ,[prijslijst],[prijs_n_old],[prijs83_old],[korting_old],[bdr_ev_ed_val] ,[bdr_d_ev_val],[bdr_vat_val],[bdr_inv_d_val],[bdr_val],[prijs83],[prijs_n] ,[fiattering],[ordbv_afdr],[ordbv_afgd],[runid],[rowstatus]) SELECT '%abeisourcedb%' as db , k.ord_soort, k.ordernr, r.ID, r.regel, r.artcode, r.oms45, r.esr_aantal, r.prijslijst, r.prijs_n as prijs_n_old, r.prijs83 as prijs83_old, r.korting as korting_old , r.bdr_ev_ed_val, r.bdr_d_ev_val, r.bdr_vat_val, r.bdr_inv_d_val, r.bdr_val
, CAST(ROUND(r.prijs83 * 1.065,2) as decimal(16,2)) as prijs83 , CAST(ROUND(r.prijs_n * 1.065,2) as decimal(16,2)) as prijs_n
, k.fiattering , k.ordbv_afdr , k.ordbv_afgd
, '%runid%' , 1
FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orkrg k WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ordernr = k.ordernr INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.cicmpy c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.debnr = k.debnr WHERE 1=1 AND k.afgehandld = 0 -- Open orders AND k.ord_soort = 'V' -- Sales order AND r.ar_soort != 'P' -- Exclude condition lines AND r.artcode NOT LIKE 'TXT%' -- exclude text items as spot buy, ZCOM and MAN AND r.uitgifte = 0 and r.pakbon_afg = 0 -- Open rows AND r.reeds_fakt = 0 -- include delivered but not invoiced rows and r.prijs_n > 0.1 -- Exclude zero and negative rows AND ISNULL(k.debnr,'') not in ( SELECT DISTINCT ce.debnr collate database_default FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_PriceUpdate23_ExclAccounts] ce where division = '%abeisourcedb%' ) AND ISNULL(k.fakdebnr,'') not in ( SELECT DISTINCT ce.debnr collate database_default FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_PriceUpdate23_ExclAccounts] ce where division = '%abeisourcedb%' ) AND ISNULL(k.verzdebnr,'') not in ( SELECT DISTINCT ce.debnr collate database_default FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_PriceUpdate23_ExclAccounts] ce where division = '%abeisourcedb%' ) AND ISNULL(r.prijslijst,'') not in ( SELECT DISTINCT pe.Pricelist collate database_default FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_PriceUpdate23_PricelistList] pe WITH (NOLOCK) ) and k.syscreated > '2022-12-01' -- orders created after 01-12-22 and r.afldat >= '2023-01-01' -- delivery date in 2023 and (r.korting <= -6.6 or r.korting >= -6.4 ) -- don't update rows that already have the new price AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM DBO._AB_TB_ABEI_ORDERPRICEUPDATE O WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND O.DB = '%ABEISOURCEDB%' AND O.ID = R.ID)

SELECT TOP (100) o.ordernr as HeaderID , o.ordernr , o.ID --, o.prijs83 --, o.prijs_n , o.prijs83_old as prijs83 , o.prijs_n_old as prijs_n FROM dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ID = o.ID WHERE 1=1 AND o.rowstatus = 1 AND o.db = '%abeitargetdb%' AND o.prijs83 > 0 AND o.ord_soort = 'V'
--AND (r.prijs83 <> o.prijs83 --OR r.prijs_n <> o.prijs_n)
AND o.reverted = 1 AND ( abs(r.prijs83 - o.prijs83_old) > 0.01 OR abs(r.prijs_n - o.prijs_n_old) > 0.01)
-- Test --AND o.ordernr = '12017403'--'11640141'--'11913948'--'11907729'--'11640141' ORDER BY o.ordernr, o.ID

WITH orderlines AS ( SELECT TOP (100) o.ordernr as HeaderID , o.ordernr , o.ID , o.prijs83 , o.prijs_n FROM dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ID = o.ID WHERE 1=1 AND o.rowstatus = 1 AND o.db = '%abeitargetdb%' AND o.prijs83 > 0 AND o.ord_soort = 'V'
--AND (r.prijs83 <> o.prijs83 --OR r.prijs_n <> o.prijs_n)
AND o.reverted = 1 AND ( abs(r.prijs83 - o.prijs83_old) > 0.01 OR abs(r.prijs_n - o.prijs_n_old) > 0.01)
ORDER BY o.ordernr, o.ID ) SELECT DISTINCT HeaderID, ordernr FROM orderlines

SELECT o.ordernr as HeaderID , o.ordernr , o.ID , o.prijs_n FROM dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ID = o.ID WHERE 1=1 AND o.rowstatus = 1 AND o.db = '%abeitargetdb%' AND o.prijs83 > 0 AND o.ord_soort = 'V'
AND o.prijs_n = 0 AND (r.prijs_n <> o.prijs_n)
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM [%abeidb%].dbo._AB_Entity_results r WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND r.jobid = %jobid% AND r.runid = '%runid%' AND r.Entity = 'SalesOrderLine' AND r.[action] = 'update' AND r.TargetDB = '%abeitargetdb%' AND r.HeaderID = o.ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT )

SELECT DISTINCT o.ordernr as HeaderID , o.ordernr FROM dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ID = o.ID WHERE 1=1 AND o.rowstatus = 1 AND o.db = '%abeitargetdb%' AND o.prijs83 > 0 AND o.ord_soort = 'V'
AND o.prijs_n = 0 AND (r.prijs_n <> o.prijs_n)
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM [%abeidb%].dbo._AB_Entity_results r WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND r.jobid = %jobid% AND r.runid = '%runid%' AND r.Entity = 'SalesOrderLine' AND r.[action] = 'update' AND r.TargetDB = '%abeitargetdb%' AND r.HeaderID = o.ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT )
step.stepname: Update order to 0 for DB - Header

step.datasource:
UPDATE o WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET -- SELECT rowstatus = 2 , runid = '%runid%' , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.ID = o.ID WHERE 1=1 AND o.rowstatus = 1 AND o.db = '%abeisourcedb%' AND o.prijs83 > 0 AND o.ord_soort = 'V'
--AND r.prijs83 = o.prijs83 --AND r.prijs_n = o.prijs_n
AND o.reverted = 1 AND ( abs(r.prijs83 - o.prijs83_old) < 0.01 OR abs(r.prijs_n - o.prijs_n_old) < 0.01)

SELECT CASE WHEN l.ct > 0 THEN 100 ELSE 9020 END as seqno FROM ( SELECT COUNT(o.ID) as ct FROM [ABSC_Data].dbo._AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate o WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND o.db = '%abeisourcedb%' AND o.rowstatus = 1 AND o.ord_soort = 'V' ) l

select o.debnr, k.ord_debtor_name, CASE WHEN o.ord_contactemail IS NULL THEN o.inv_contactemail ELSE o.ord_contactemail END AS ord_contactemail , CASE WHEN o.ord_contactemail = o.inv_contactemail OR o.ord_contactemail IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE o.inv_contactemail END AS inv_contactemail, o.ordernr, k.docnumber, o.regel, o.artcode, o.oms45, o.esr_aantal, o.prijs_n_old, r.prijs_n, CONVERT(varchar,r.afldat,101) as afldat, ia.ItemCodeAccount, h.mail from [absc_data].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate] o inner join [400]..orkrg k with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = k.ordernr inner join [400]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = r.ordernr and o.id = r.id inner join [orlaco]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on o.debnr = c.debnr collate database_default left join [orlaco]..ItemAccounts ia with (NOLOCK) on ia.AccountCode = c.cmp_wwn and ia.ItemCode = o.artcode left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man where o.db = '400' and o.reverted = 0 and o.emailsent=0 and o.ord_soort = 'V' and c.ClassificationId != 'OEM' and (o.ord_contactemail IS NOT NULL OR o.inv_contactemail IS NOT NULL) UNION select o.debnr, k.ord_debtor_name, CASE WHEN o.ord_contactemail IS NULL THEN o.inv_contactemail ELSE o.ord_contactemail END AS ord_contactemail , CASE WHEN o.ord_contactemail = o.inv_contactemail OR o.ord_contactemail IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE o.inv_contactemail END AS inv_contactemail, o.ordernr, k.docnumber, o.regel, o.artcode, o.oms45, o.esr_aantal, o.prijs_n_old, r.prijs_n, CONVERT(varchar,r.afldat,101) as afldat, ia.ItemCodeAccount,h.mail from [absc_data].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate] o inner join [483]..orkrg k with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = k.ordernr inner join [483]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = r.ordernr and o.id = r.id inner join [orlaco]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on o.debnr = c.debnr collate database_default left join [orlaco]..ItemAccounts ia with (NOLOCK) on ia.AccountCode = c.cmp_wwn and ia.ItemCode = o.artcode left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man where o.db = '483' and o.reverted = 0 and o.emailsent=0 and o.ord_soort = 'V' and c.ClassificationId != 'OEM' and (o.ord_contactemail IS NOT NULL OR o.inv_contactemail IS NOT NULL) UNION select o.debnr, k.ord_debtor_name, CASE WHEN o.ord_contactemail IS NULL THEN o.inv_contactemail ELSE o.ord_contactemail END AS ord_contactemail , CASE WHEN o.ord_contactemail = o.inv_contactemail OR o.ord_contactemail IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE o.inv_contactemail END AS inv_contactemail, o.ordernr, k.docnumber, o.regel, o.artcode, o.oms45, o.esr_aantal, o.prijs_n_old, r.prijs_n, CONVERT(varchar,r.afldat,101) as afldat, ia.ItemCodeAccount, h.mail from [absc_data].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_OrderPriceUpdate] o inner join [484]..orkrg k with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = k.ordernr inner join [484]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = r.ordernr and o.id = r.id inner join [orlaco]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on o.debnr = c.debnr collate database_default left join [orlaco]..ItemAccounts ia with (NOLOCK) on ia.AccountCode = c.cmp_wwn and ia.ItemCode = o.artcode left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man where o.db = '484' and o.reverted = 0 and o.emailsent=0 and o.ord_soort = 'V' and c.ClassificationId != 'OEM' and (o.ord_contactemail IS NOT NULL OR o.inv_contactemail IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY debnr,ord_debtor_name, ord_contactemail, ordernr, regel
step.contentbody:
To: %ord_debtor_name% - %ord_contactemail%, %inv_contactemail%

Dear Customer,

A few weeks ago, we announced a 6% price increase effective January 1, 2022.
Existing orders placed on or before November 15th, 2021 will keep the original price. For all orders entered after November 15th, 2021 our prices have been increased by 6%. Please see below the new prices for your open orders that have been placed after November 15th, 2021.

We kindly request you to update your system with the new prices. We can send you an updated price list upon request.

Order numberYour ReferenceItemcode Your ItemcodeDescriptionQuantity Old Price New PriceDelivery Date
%OrderNr%%docnumber%%artcode%%ItemCodeAccount% %oms45%%esr_aantal%%prijs_n_old%%prijs_n%%afldat%
 

Best regards,
Stoneridge | ORLACO – Vision is our mission®
